mapper.select: SELECT mat_no AS matNo , mat_id AS matId , description , use_yn AS useYn , attr1 , attr2 , attr3 , attr4 , attr5 , attr6 , attr7 , attr8 , attr9 , attr10 , regid AS regId , reg_date AS regDate FROM tbl_mat_info WHERE mat_no = #{matNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(mat_no)+1 FROM tbl_mat_info
INSERT INTO tbl_mat_info ( mat_no , mat_id , description , use_yn , attr1 , attr2 , attr3 , attr4 , attr5 , attr6 , attr7 , attr8 , attr9 , attr10 , regid , reg_date ) VALUES ( IFNULL(#{matNo},1) , #{matId} , #{description} , #{useYn} , 'attr1' , 'attr2' , 'attr3' , 'attr4' , 'attr5' , 'attr6' , 'attr7' , 'attr8' , 'attr9' , 'attr10' , #{regId} , NOW() )
